channel.title: CVE Feed for Pivotal -- Spring Framework
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pivotal -- Spring Framework

item.title: CVE-2014-0225|2024-08-06T09:05:39.298Z -- pivotal -- spring%20framework
item.description: When processing user provided XML documents, the Spring Framework 4.0.0 to 4.0.4, 3.0.0 to 3.2.8, and possibly earlier unsupported versions did not disable by default the resolution of URI references in a DTD declaration. This enabled an XXE attack.
